summary:
Popcorn is a special type of corn that pops when heated, turning into a fluffy snack. It's an ancient treat, enjoyed for thousands of years. The kernel's hard outer layer traps steam, which builds up pressure until it explodes, making the popcorn kernel expand.

A specific type of corn, called Zea mays everta, is often used for popcorn. This variety is one of the six main types of corn, each with different characteristics. Popcorn is typically seasoned with salt or sugar, making it a popular and delicious snack.
title: Popcorn
